hero.title: Dmytro Chushko
hero.description: I am an accomplished Full Stack developer with about 2 years of commercial experience focused on ReactJS and NodeJS application development. Currently, I am actively seeking opportunities to progress my career as a Full Stack developer or in related fields, ready to engage and collaborate at the earliest chance. I have a proven capacity to rapidly acquire and apply new technologies. I excel in team settings and thrive in dynamic work environments. Additionally, I bring not only technical proficiency but also enthusiasm, creativity, and a positive outlook to the workplace.

form_validation_message.max_symbols: it has to be not more than 5
form_validation_message.allowed_image_type: Only JPG and PNG images are allowed
